page.title: 09THE SUMMER SPECTACULAR
page.content: Every year,the weekend nearest to { {St.Peter's Day,}is celebrated in { {Salesbury}village.In 1985,a children's disco on Friday 28th.June,began this year's jollifications. At noon,Saturday,the{Rose Queen}was crowned in Church,followed by a procession to the School,headed by {Balderstone Pipe Band,}to enjoy the afternoon's entertainments and money raising stalls.There were Keep Fit Dancers,Morris Dancers,Maypole Dancers ,the Pipers,a Falcon Display,Hot Air Balloon,Pony Rides,Team Races,Games of Skill and Chance,Roundabouts,Stalls with every kind of thing to buy,liquid refreshments for adults in the Marquee and soft drinks and eats in the School Hall. At night a{Barbeque and Disco}in the Marquee helped boost the money raised to Â£17,000.
